overview: When businesses run rampant with corruption, the white-collared Lucas Men find their wallets and bodies falling prey to Corporate Exploitation. Ben Batemen gives his ass to Rafael Alencar for a promotion. Stas Landon, Jake Morgan, and Max Adonis have a lunch-hour threesome. Andrey Vic offers his body as business collateral to Dylan James and Alexander Volkov. And Braxton Boyd submits to his boss, Andre Donovan.
title: Gentlemen 27: Corporate Exploitation
